channel.title: Hosting 317, It Shows Online; Hosting 508, It Shows Offline
channel.description:
If i host a 317 it shows online on Server Status Pages If i host a 508 it shows offline on Server Status Pages
And nobody can connect to my 508.
Both ports are on the correct port.
Any Ideas?

item.title: Hosting 317, It Shows Online; Hosting 508, It Shows Offline
item.dc:creator: @DanielEkins DanielEkins
item.description:
@DanielEkins wrote:

No, I turn my 317 on, it shows online on runelocus, i turn it off, then turn my 508 on on port on 43594 so only one server is on and the 508 shows offline

Read full topic
item.source: Hosting 317, It Shows Online; Hosting 508, It Shows Offline

item.title: Hosting 317, It Shows Online; Hosting 508, It Shows Offline

u cant have both 317 and 508 hosting on port 43594 try changing the 317 to 5555 and re portfowardingâ€¦
